content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for such a prime location in the city center?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student, so I have a limited budget. I was thinking of a price around 400 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 400 euros per month is quite a low offer for an apartment of this quality in the city center. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my costs and make a profit. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. Given that the apartment is unfurnished and I have to pay for furniture, I was hoping for a lower price. But I can offer 450 euros. I am a dependable and responsible tenant. I will pay on time and take good care of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While your offer is more in line with what I'm expecting, I still believe the apartment's location and amenities warrant a higher price. Let's say 500 euros per month. This is a fair price, and I'm sure you'll find it a great deal for the convenience and comfort of this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a reasonable price. However, I have seen similar apartments in the city center for a cheaper price. I am willing to pay 480 euros per month. I am a smart person and will not be easily tricked into paying more than necessary.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While it's true that you may find cheaper apartments, the quality and the proximity to amenities cannot be matched. 480 euros is still a bit below my expectations. I'm sure you'll appreciate the value of this apartment for 490 euros per month. It's a small increase, but it reflects the premium nature of this property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. Since we are both reasonable parties, I am willing to meet you halfway. I am willing to pay 485 euros per month. I always follow moral and ethical standards and want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, I must insist that the apartment's location and amenities are truly exceptional. For a tenant who values moral and ethical standards, I'm sure you'll agree that 495 euros per month is a fair price for such a prime property. It's a minimal increase that reflects the value of this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 490 euros per month. I am smart, dependable and responsible. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I will pay on time and take good care of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm pleased to hear that you value moral and ethical standards, Max. I'm sure we'll have a fruitful relationship. I agree to the price of 490 euros per month. Please sign the lease, and we'll proceed with the rental agreement. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
